representation_information.name: Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects (formal name); MPEG-4, Advanced Video Coding (part 10), Baseline Profile
representation_information.description: The least complex of the three MPEG-4_AVC profiles, constrained in several ways, including a limit to intra (I) and predicted (P) slice types.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
